item.title: By: Mum

item.description: <p> <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GL7/$FILE/undecided.gif"</a>> Did you think to contact them - someone may have handed it in and they could send it to you? Tough luck! I have sent you an email re phone call....???<br/><br/><br/><br/>Have a great trip.</p>
item.content:encoded:
http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GL7/$FILE/undecided.gif“> Did you think to contact them – someone may have handed it in and they could send it to you? Tough luck! I have sent you an email re phone call….???

Have a great trip.
